title: Former US Center for SafeSport Investigator Arrested on Rape and Sex Trafficking Charges
content:
Jason Krasley was fired from SafeSport last year over a different criminal charge; his latest arrest surfaces question's about the agency's hiring process.

Read the full article at Former US Center for SafeSport Investigator Arrested on Rape and Sex Trafficking Charges on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
